description: To create a user dictionary from a PQB file, select Settings â†’ Manage Dictionaries from the "SETTINGS" tab in the Navigation pane and click "Add User." Then locate and choose your PQB file.
PQB files are similar to .PQB-BACKUP files that are used by older versions of Pleco Chinese Dictionary.
NOTE: When backing up and restoring PQB files that contain flashcards, be sure to select the "Backup Database" and "Restore Database" commands instead of "Export Cards" and "Import Cards."
